name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior AI Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in **Python**, **TypeScript**, and **AI agents** development, including **LLMs** and **prompt engineering**. Proven expertise in **DevOps** practices and **CI/CD** pipelines, ensuring efficient and scalable deployment of AI solutions. Skilled in cloud technologies, proficiently deploying applications on **AWS** and **Azure**.

Extensive experience in building high-performance applications that leverage AI/ML capabilities, supporting predictive analytics and automation in the healthcare and financial sectors. Adept in the development of compliance-driven solutions in alignment with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Strong communicator with a solid background in MLOps, employing evaluation frameworks and orchestration strategies using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** to enhance project efficiency.
